entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.4.4

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.4.4 is available. 1.4.4 is a stable servicing release for the WinAppSDK that fixes critical bugs for 1.4.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.4.4 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.4.231219000.

entry.title: microsoft/WindowsAppSDK - Releases - 2024-01-10
entry.content:
Windows App SDK 1.4.4 (1.4.231219000)

Windows App SDK 1.4.4 (1.4.231219000)

Windows App SDK 1.4.4 is a stable servicing release that fixes critical bugs for 1.4.

  • If you're building an app with the Windows App SDK for the first time, follow the installation instructions here.

  • If you are already using the Windows App SDK 1.4 and would like to update to the latest release, you can do so by following the update instructions here.

Check out our release notes for the list of issues fixed in this release.

Updating to this version

The 1.4.4 package is available at https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.4.231219000
